pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
meanings: penguapan; hilangnya secara tidak dapat dijelaskan

pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

related.meaning: ide; cara berpikir (sama seperti 考え方 (かんがえかた))

lessons.japanese: 聞きましたわよ。ご両親が借金を残して蒸発したそうですわね。
lessons.indonesian: I've heard about it. Your parents disappeared, running out on their debt didn't they?

lessons.japanese: 水分は温められると蒸発する。
lessons.indonesian: Water evaporates when it is heated.

lessons.japanese: 暑い日に水は早く蒸発する。
lessons.indonesian: In hot weather, water evaporates quickly.
